strapiJob.title: Lead AV Tech
strapiJob.description:
Quickly growing, NWA audiovisual integration company looking for a Lead Technician. This role requires a high level of client service and coordination in addition to technical skills. Skills, and work ethic will embody our mission “to provide a fantastic user experience”. If you are passionate about AV, and finding solutions to AV problems, or you are interested in working towards becoming that person, we will provide the necessary training, support, and work environment to help you succeed. We take pride in our employees, who are known in the industry as client focused, solution oriented, and love delivering the latest AV technology and service.

Will you fit in?

  • You can work independently with minimal guidance, but aren’t afraid to ask the right questions when you need help.
  • You have strong verbal and written communication skills, and can be the face of our company to our clients.
  • You enjoy continuing education and occasional travel.
  • Relocation package opportunity available.

Does experience count?

  • Education: Associates degree is preferred, but not required. We take into account your experience/skill level and what you bring to the table as an individual.
  • Attitude and Aptitude: Are key! We need someone who is eager to learn and comes to work ready to tackle any situation.

The ideal candidate will have:

  • 3-5 years of experience in video conferencing, large-scale audio, video board, and control systems installation,
  • Good working knowledge of automation systems including
  • QSYS, RTI, Crestron
  • Rack fabrication: pull/terminate a variety of cables, with the end product visually pleasing and efficient.
  • Service/system maintenance: XTEN-AV Design Software for composition of one-line project drawings, and read drawings/blueprints
  • Ability to troubleshoot video and audio signal flow.
  • Perform Needs Assessment in various types of spaces (House of Worship, Education,Corporate, Recreational)

Ability to independently run a live rental event (audio/video/livestream) including proficiently deploying and setting up:

  • Analog or digital mixer
  • Powered speaker systems
  • Projection equipment
  • Small to large format projection screens
  • Must be able to lift over 50 pounds over your head, have a valid driver's license, and clean driving record.

Please send resume to scott@allavservices.com.
